Description of the KMC_Run class
********************************

class KMC_Run.kmc_traj

   Handles a single Zacros trajectory. Inherits from IOdata.

   AdjustPreExponentials(delta_sdf)

      Adjust the pre-exponential ratios of all elementary reactions

   CalcRateTraj(Product)

      Compute instantaneous rates

   CheckGasConvergence(gas_stoich, r_sqr_cut=0.98, rate_perc=0.03)

      Check whether the simulation is at steady state using gas
      species profiles

   ComputeTOF(Product, win=[0.0, 1.0])

      Compute the turnover frequency over a given window

   LatticeMovie(include_neighbor_lines=False, spec_color_list=['b', 'g', 'r', 'c', 'm', 'y', 'k'])

      Create a .png file with a picture of a lattice for every
      snapshot in history_output.txt

   PlotElemStepFreqs(window=[0.0, 1.0], time_norm=False, site_norm=1)

      Plot a bar graph of elementary step frequencies versus time

   PlotGasSpecVsTime()

      Plot gas phase species profiles versus time

   PlotIntPropsVsTime(save=True)

      Plot integral propensities versus time

   PlotLattice()

      Plot the lattice

   PlotPropsVsTime()

      Plot elementary step propensities versus time

   PlotRateVsTime()

      Plot instantaneous rate versus time

   PlotSurfSpecVsTime(site_norm=1)

      Plot surface species profiles versus time

   PlotWVsTime()

      Plot trajectory derivatives versus time

   PrintElemStepFreqs(window=[0.0, 1.0], time_norm=False, site_norm=1.0)

      Write elementary step frequencies into an output file

   Run_sim()

      Call the Zacros executable and run the simulation

   avg_in_window(data, limits)

      Ergodically average data within a time window

   fraction_search(frac)

      Given a fraction of the final time, compute the time point

   time_avg_props()

      ???

   static time_sandwich(run1, run2)

      Take two trajectories and append them

   time_search(t)

      Given a time, look up the index of the time vector nearest to
      that time
